name: Dice and Slice Night
description: Roll the dice and slice some pizza! Join us for an evening of games and cheesy goodness.

name: Meeples and Margaritas
description: Sip on a margarita while playing your favorite board games with friends!

name: Catan and Coffee
description: Settle in for an afternoon of Catan and freshly brewed coffee. May the best settler win!

name: Pandemic and Pints
description: Can you save the world while enjoying a pint? Join us for an exciting game night.

name: Monopoly Madness
description: It's time to get rich or go bankrupt in a night of Monopoly mayhem!

name: Chess and Cheers
description: Challenge your friends to a game of chess and toast to the victories and defeats.

name: Scrabble Scramble
description: Put your word skills to the test in a fun and competitive Scrabble tournament.

name: Ticket to Ride Tournament
description: All aboard for an epic Ticket to Ride tournament with fabulous prizes!

name: Clue and Cocktails
description: Solve the mystery while sipping on delicious cocktails. Who's the murderer?

name: Exploding Kittens Extravaganza
description: Avoid the exploding kittens and enjoy a night of laughter and strategy.
